name: Breaking Ball (Alan | Xyphire)
description:
I made this game for a university/school project at ISART Digital Paris (Game Designer), it is the first game that I made at this school.

We were asked to make a One Button Game, so this game can only be played by using the Space Bar!

(But you can reset a level by pushing the Escape button and you can quit the game by long pressing it)

Menu
To select a level in the menu you can :

  • Push once the Space Bar to select the next menu button
  • Long press the Space Bar to validate your choice

While playing

  • You can restart a level by pressing the "Escape" key.
  • To quit the game, you can long press the "Escape" key.

Hope you will enjoy it!
